metadata.ns:textReviewContext: Remote user interacts with a cloud application
metadata.ns:textName: AE02 EDoS Attack To Cloud Application
metadata.ns:textReviewProblem: EDoS (Economic Denial of Sustainability or Economic Denial of Service) attack against cloud application from the Internet
metadata.ns:textReference: MS-3: An attack that leads to an excessive use of resources that are billed for, resulting in an Economic Denial of Service (E-DoS) [SECCRIT]; R.16: ECONOMIC DENIAL OF SERVICE (EDOS) [ENISA]; Economic Denial of Service [QUIRC]; Economic Durability [Rath]
